inclusion.criterion: Willing to take the planned antibiotic treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Planning to deliver at 1 of the study sites
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to come back for follow-up visits for 1 year after the baby is born
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have taken antibiotics, except for syphilis or gonorrhea, within the last 2 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Are allergic to penicillin, ampicillin, erythromycin, or metronidazole
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have major illnesses, such as diabetes, severe kidney or heart disease, or active tuberculosis, which might affect the pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Are having major problems with the pregnancy, such as placenta previa, ruptured membranes, or multiple pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have a central nervous system disease, such as seizures
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has myasthenia gravis and takes pyridostigmine. She still experiences symptoms that interfere with her job.
